import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import ArrowSvg from '../components/icons/ArrowSvg' import { Spinner } from '../components/spinner/spinner' import AllTrending from '../dashboard/featured/Trending' import LatestMovie from '../dashboard/LatestMovie' import FetchTrendsQuery from '../hooks/getAllTrends' import TrendingMovie from '../dashboard/featured/TrendingMovies' import TrendingTv from '../dashboard/featured/TrendingTv' export default function Display() { const buttonStyle = 'rounded bg-[#1a212d] ml-2 my-2 px-2 text-center text-[#605f62] h-[30px] font-light text-[12px]' const buttonStyle1 = 'rounded bg-[#ffae06] text-white ml-2 my-2 px-2 text-center h-[30px] font-light text-[12px]' const [activeButton, setActiveButton] = useState('trending') const handButton = (buttonName:any)=>{ setActiveButton() } const {isLoading, isError:FetchTrendingError, isSuccess, data:Movies} = FetchTrendsQuery() useEffect(()=>{ const fetchData = async()=>{ try{ await FetchTrendsQuery() } catch(err:any){ console.log('err', err) } } fetchData() },[]) // Implementing the FetchLatestQuery console.log('data is', Movies) // s return (
